alert.note: Alert for Taylor (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LaCrosse (Southwestern Wisconsin, Southeastern Minnesota, and Northeast Iowa)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 16 at 9:30AM CST until January 16 at 12:00PM CST by NWS LaCrosse
info.description: ...Some Slippery Travel Still Possible This Morning... .Medford County Sheriff Department reports that some of the streets are slippery in Medford this morning. With temperatures near or at freezing, cannot rule out a light glaze of ice especially in the eastern half of the county. Check road conditions before heading out this morning. Although icing amounts may be minor, untreated roads and sidewalks may be slippery this morning. ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON CST TODAY... * WHAT...Freezing rain. Additional ice accumulations of a light glaze. * WHERE...Taylor County. * WHEN...Until noon CST today. * IMPACTS...Very slippery sidewalks, roads and bridges are possible.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Prepare for possible power outages. Visit 511wi.gov for road conditions.
